__e: Pierre and I have been in love since we met.
[Yolande] Initially, because we didn't know who he was, we're confused. Pierre and I are confused.
We would get Pierre, and they would get the money, then we'd each go our separate ways.
"What would it be like if Pierre was back?"
Pierre was fuckin' outta control, man. I couldn't stop him.
Pierre was a really awesome person and very nice, too.
